Замечательная игра. Линейная бродилка. Канализации, заброшенные заводы, тюремные застенки и другие жуткие места не отпускают на протяжении всей игры. Одним словом, Valve умеет держать напряжение, об этом говорит и конец 2 части Half-Life ;)

I originally bought this game because I had played a lot of Garry's Mod and I wanted to see the source material for that game. I enjoyed playing through this game on Hard mode and eventually beating it. It motivated me to eventually buy Half Life 1, which motivated me to buy and play more and more shooters from the 90's, leading me to where I am today with my Steam library occupied largely by Doom and Quake games.

That's all I really have to say.

I suppose I took this game for granted in a way because I first played it as a 14 year old or so years and years after release, years and years after every other FPS had already studied this game like a book to borrow all of it's greatest tricks. Even then, I enjoyed Half Life 1 more than this game. Maybe I just prefer the setting of Half Life 1 more, since it's less strictly science fiction and set in a cool desert and all that.
One word: Amazing

Best. Game. Ever.  If you like games you need to have completed this.  It is sublime and extraordinary in many ways.  The world draws you into it in subtle ways and is periodically broken up with engaging puzzles, contextual combat which is never repetitive and some of the most convincing charaterisation and voice acting in any video game.  

It's on offer - buy it.  Do you have friends? - Buy it for them.  Still in doubt?  Look at the metacritic reviews.

My job here is done.

Whilst the graphics are a bit outdated the gameplay and story quality are not. Plus it is fully moddable. So if you dont want to play this game in it's default low-res textures, you can always download custom hd textures online and install them via the custom folder. The story is extensive and will keep you on your feet for hours to come.
